Author: snefferu
Text: Actually the balcony might give you the most accurate reading ;) it’s most likely to have a solid and even surface. Otherwise, pick one and stick to that- whether it’s accurate or not it should be consistent, and your progress or maintenance should be accurate at least :)

Author: theycallmewidowmaker
Text: Don't trust carpet or tiles- they're uneven surfaces that alter the reading.  Wood and linoleum are your safest bet
